name: Flower Shop (Arya Vatan-Abadi)
description:
flower shop

Run a small flower stand where your goal is to serve customers as quickly as possible. The more and faster correct orders you serve, the higher your score will be. Do you have what it takes to become a flower serving machine?

Flower Shop is a jam game made for the Spring Game Jammin' game jam, where the theme was "BLOOMING". I knew I wanted to do something with blooming flowers so I decided to challenge myself and make a simple stand tycoon type game where your objective is to give the correct flowers to customers.  The game was designed and developed solely by me in 2 days and you can find the list of assets I used below.

controls
  • Use your mouse to click on buttons and drag flower items in the stand
